title: Ocean Paradise
address: 28-29, Hotel Motel Zone, Road, Cox's Bazar 4700, Bangladesh
description: Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort offers a luxurious beachfront experience on Cox’s Bazar, the world’s longest natural sea beach. With modern amenities like a swimming pool, spa, and diverse dining options, it caters to leisure and business travelers. Proximity to attractions like Himchori Waterfall and Inani Beach makes it ideal for explorers.
